title._content: Image taken from page 321 of 'The Life, Travels and Adventures of F. de Soto, discoverer of the Mississippi ... Steel engravings by J. & S. Sartain, ... The illustrations, designed and engraved on wood, by J. W. Orr and R. Telfer, etc'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Life, Travels and Adventures of F. de Soto, discoverer of the Mississippi ... Steel engravings by J. & S. Sartain, ... The illustrations, designed and engraved on wood, by J. W. Orr and R. Telfer, etc" Author: WILMER, Lambert A. Contributor: ORR, John William - Wood Engraver Contributor: SARTAIN, John. Contributor: SARTAIN, Samuel. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10411.cc.13." Page: 321 Place of Publishing: Philadelphia Date of Publishing: 1859 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 003941697 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
